name: Proto Tower 7
description: This is the second proto tower I'm drawing tonight, and it went a lot faster and i think looks a little bit more fluid and interesting. i also learned a nice new terminal command to copy my json template for `n` number of times, i've decided that's an interesting tidbit to add as metadata, so i've added `code snippet` to see how that formats and looks in a trait

attributes.value: for i in {8..n}; do cp 7.json '$i.json'; done
